Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Sven Aelterman
Reviews.Content: This small camera has some pros and some cons. For me, this is a secondary camera (used when my wife and I travel separately), and it performs very well for that purpose.Pros- Lightweight- Plenty of shooting options- Price- Built-in battery (no hassles with AA batteries, etc. like other cameras in this price range)- Battery lifetimeCons- The shoot mode dial on top changes easily when the camera is in a pocket. You need to make sure that it didn't change (or you'll start recording a video when you really wanted a picture, etc.)- Closeups are a bit blurry, even when using the built-in mode for that.- Flash takes a while to charge- No standard USB connector - you have to travel with the supplied cable to sync and charge.

Reviews.Title: Samsung L100 digital camera
Reviews.Author: M. Fisher
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung L100 8.2 MP digital camera for my daughter's birthday, on the recommendation of my son.  I asked him to find one that was simple to use, reasonably priced, and took good photos and this one more than filled the bill.  I love dealing with Amazon and have always been happy with purchases made through them. My daughter enjoys using it and the pictures are great.  It can even take movies and uses rechargable batteries, a real plus since disposable batteries can be expensive. We would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A $100 Technical Masterpiece
Reviews.Author: Smokey Joe "S&J;"
Reviews.Content: Having owned a few Nikon digital SLR's and point and shoots, I was drawn to this camera by its cool looks at first. With its ability to shoot fully manual, adjust white balance, two hours of moving video, and numerous other desirable features including a tripod socket, how can you go wrong for this price? Samsung knows how to pack alot of bang for the buck into a small, attractive and effective package. I hope to break it in soon.

Reviews.Title: **** Better than Expected. Good Value for the Money ****
Reviews.Author: Sarwat Ezzeldin "PrinceAly"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my 18 years old grandniece as her first camera. Over the years, I've owned many cameras from Canon, Nikon, Sony, etc. And after reading numerous reviews, what attracted me to this camera was the ease of use, the girly color, and the price. It turned out to be a good choice. And my grandniece loves it. She was able to figure out how to use it on her own in no time.The camera is very easy to use, it took very good to excellent pictures in a variety of lighting conditions, it records video, it's small enough to fit in a shirt pocket, has rechargeable battery that last for many, many pictures even with flash. In addition, it has the expansion slot for SD card, so you can take any number of photos depending on the SD card.Overall, this is a very good everyday use camera and a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: C. Valentine "Proud Hokie"
Reviews.Content: Just bought this camera recently and have been using it frequently.  This is a very, very easy camera to use, and the picture quality is fantastic.  The best part is you don't have to spend an arm and a leg for it.  If you're very passionate about cameras and photos, you'll probably want to purchase a digital SLR; but if you just need a casual, point-and-shoot camera, I highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: This little guy can take a beating!
Reviews.Author: royallyshady
Reviews.Content: I have had my Samsung L100 for about 4 1/2 years now and it has been to you-know-where and back and has held up the test of time! It takes the best photos and is super easy to use. It's a great starter camera and will last you a very long time

Reviews.Title: Portable, Easy to Use; Some Pictures Are Not Rendered Correctly
Reviews.Author: Ryan Kelly
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift, and used it on my recent trip to Italy. Imagine my dismay when I discovered that many of the pictures I had taken were not even valid jpegs! No program could open them! Moreover, many other pictures had not been processed correctly by the camera, leading to images that are missing color channels, split, or a combination of the two. Hopefully this is an isolated issue, because otherwise this camera works well for simple point-and-shoot purposes.

Reviews.Title: samsung l100 camera
Reviews.Author: Henry M. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: I have used the camera for about one month. The picture quality is excellent. I am very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung L100 camera
Reviews.Author: buddybuck1
Reviews.Content: I love this camera so much that I purchased the last 3 that I could find on line.  I can take a CD card out of my tree camera & veiw the photos right away.  When I tried this with my other digital cameras, they would freeze up & I would have to pull the battery in order to turn them off.  With this camera it's easy to use (that is why my husband wouldn't give me my original one back & I had to buy another one for me) I can take a photo & enlarge & even crop it right away.  I wish they would still make this one.  I don't like the so call improvements on the new model.

Reviews.Title: Was great while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Richard Widman "Richard"
Reviews.Content: I bought this a couple of years ago to take pics of the grandchildren, movies of the races, and document my car restoration. Excellent pictures although I find my self adjusting the shadows some to bring up the darker parts, but good color results. Great battery life. I wish it had flash fill. It is also a little weak on saturation. Colors are not as brilliant as they could be.But the low point appears to be the lens mechanism. It reached a point where it would sometimes not make it all the way out, going back in with a beep, beep, beep. then it became constant, needing a little help to pull it out. Now even if you coax it out it won't focus.I did get a few thousand good pictures out of it.I ordered a Canon PowerShot A3000IS to replace it.

Reviews.Title: samsung L100. good and bad
Reviews.Author: Margot N. Alexander
Reviews.Content: great camera pretty good pictures but the only thing i dont like is when you take the flash off thats what I hate. To my knowledge there is no way to take the shake mode off when not using flash. I usually use a tripod or my hands but I am always still. And when I take a pic it comes out so blurry. soo very good camera as long as you dont use the flash mode but if your hands are having a seizure the non flash/ shake mode might work. If anyone knows a way to fix this please feel free to tell me the solution

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Green Goddess
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with high hopes however unfortunately have had bad experiences when using it.Good points:1. Lightweight2. Durable3. Good battery lifeBad points:1. Picture quality (at times I feel the flash is not effective enough to produce a good picture and photos still look quite dark however I have to say I'm not a photography expert this is just my personal opinion. I've previously had two previous cameras with lower megapixels and personally feel they had better flashes and produced better quality pictures).2. Not reliable - as another user has also mentioned, this camera has lost photos I have taken (later after taking the picture it will error and lose them when I look through), it has also done the same error when downloading pictures to my computer (which is very disappointing especially when they are photos you wish to keep). Last of all, this camera has also combined two pictures into one, which interesting as it is, it's also disappointing when you've taken nice pictures and wished not to have them combined (as they were ruined).As a result (and I'm persuming this may just be a fault with my camera, not all samsung cameras), I am now purchasing a new camera, as this one is too unreliable for me and it has not encouraged me to purchase another samsung.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for non professionals
Reviews.Author: Redd =) "sj"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for over a year.  I picked it for the pixels (8.2) and the color(red).  Kinda lame to go by color, I know.  On Thanksgiving Day, last year, I had my sister take some pictures of my family (I refuse to pay studio prices when I can get a print for a very low price at Walmart).  I blew up the one I liked to a 16x20 to hang on my wall.  It turned out perfectly.  No distortion or pixelation(if that's the right word).  I take my own pictures, individuals, of my children.  They are also all on the wall. 8x10, and of course they look magnificent.  I think it's very easy to use, and love it.  However, I made a bad choice and took my camera on a river rafting trip.  It got just a little sprinkling, and it's ruined.  But I am buying a new one because it was such a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Jim Mendenhall
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter, for christmas i knew already of the quality of this cam because i already have one of my own, deffinatly recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: David H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 15-yr old daughter. I didn't want to spend more than $100, but I also wanted at least a reasonably recognized name brand. She has just been using it for 2 months, but so far this Samsung L100 has performed extremely well. I believe we got a lot of performance for the price. It starts up very quickly, resolution is excellent, and I like that it has a built-in rechargeable battery instead of AA batteries. I opted for a 2GB SD card as well so capacity is great. I also purchased a small padded camera case to help protect it.

Reviews.Title: Nice, small & compact
Reviews.Author: C. Sylvester
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this camera is its size.  Very easy to slip in a jacket or purse.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Geri "Geri"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera before going to Mexico for my son's engagement party for its size and of course for its color - and it worked out great.  It was easy to take with me to all the activities - parties, sightseeing, family shots - and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: mostly good
Reviews.Author: L. Mote
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera with little to no research first and it was a good camera for the price. The pictures are clear and crisp. When zooming in on the pictures, detail that we didn't even know was there, was captured. My only problem came about 5 months after buying the camera when, for what seems to be no reason, the lense refuses to retract and the camera now won't shut off without me taking the battery out of it. This happened right in the middle of a birthday party for my 13 year old daughter. Even the LCD screen quit working.But, that said, I plan to buy the same type of camera to replace it.

Reviews.Title: Two words top notch
Reviews.Author: W. Aljahmi "yasmeen"
Reviews.Content: this camera is great it records music and is great for slide show use !

Reviews.Title: Samsung Never Again
Reviews.Author: Cynthia B. Edenfield "Cebo"
Reviews.Content: The camera was fine, but quit working while under warranty. There was no serial number on the unit. I guess it was on the box, but we could not find the box. After 10+ days of me calling customer service, faxing the invoice, and e-mailing a picture of the camera to prove there was not a serial number - Samsung told me it was illegal for them to service the unit under warranty. I wasted hours!! If they had told me that to start with, I could have lived with it. If at all possible, I will not by a Samsung product again.

Reviews.Title: Noisy and wrong color!
Reviews.Author: Angel Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I am dissapointed with this camera. The 8.2MP is a gimmick, it does not outperform my old 2MP camera. On top of that the color is always a bit pale, yellowish, and very noisy. The manual WB does not fix the color problem. Finally, it is slow even compared to similar cameras from 4 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: G. Abella
Reviews.Content: This is a very small Point & Shoot camera which does not take amazing pics but does the work of capturing moments. No image stabilization but for a little less than $100 it is one of the best choices if you don't want to spend a lot on a small camera. Besides, everyone can live without image stabilization in this type of product.

Reviews.Title: The price for this camera is worth it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Magdalena Diaz
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera (samsung L100 in red) and I love it!!!! I recommended. And the price is def. worth it!!!
